pages.text: Ham is a large cut of meat from a Suidae. It can be a $(l:mechanics/animal_husbandry#pig)domestic pig$() or a $(l:the_world/wild_animals#ramming_prey)boar.$() You can only get hams when you kill the animal with $(l:mechanics/damage_types)piercing damage.$() An animal can drop 2 hams at most. The drop chance is affected by its body size and familiarity (if any).
